content: Hello, I currently work for an organization that implemented version 5.12 of Dataverse, but now they want to make a backup and update this on another computer, but the truth is I have not understood the architecture and additionally I do not know what files I should backup to be able to do the respective implementation, could you help?
Hi! Generally speaking, you'll want to back up the database and the files that users have uploaded.
https://guides.dataverse.org/en/6.5/admin/backups.html mentions a script we use for Harvard Dataverse.
